abstract: General Services Administration says cavernous hole in White House lawn is elaborate renovation of building’s aging air-conditioning and electrical systems, but months-long construction has inspired much speculation.
snippet: Is it simply renovation of the air-conditioning and electrical systems? Or something more mysterious?
lead_paragraph: Is it simply renovation of the air-conditioning and electrical systems? Or something more mysterious?

headline.main: Big Hole in White House Lawn Prompts Equally Big Questions
headline.print_headline: Big Hole in White House Lawn Prompts Equally Big Questions
headline.seo: Big Hole on White House Lawn Prompts Speculation
